name: Phong Nha Midtown hotel
address: Thị trấn Phong Nha Phong Nha Midtown2 hotel, Phong Nha, Việt Nam
description:
Phong Nha Midtown hotel có xe đạp miễn phí, khu vườn, sân hiên và nhà hàng ở Phong Nha. Chỗ nghỉ cung cấp lễ tân 24/24, dịch vụ đưa đón sân bay, bếp chung và Wi-Fi miễn phí.

Tại khách sạn, các phòng đều có tủ quần áo. Với phòng tắm riêng được trang bị vòi sen và đồ vệ sinh cá nhân miễn phí, phòng khách tại Phong Nha Midtown hotel có TV màn hình phẳng và điều hòa, trong đó một số phòng có ban công. Tại chỗ nghỉ, phòng nào cũng có ga trải giường và khăn tắm.

Sân bay gần nhất là Sân bay Đồng Hới, cách Phong Nha Midtown hotel 37 km.

review.room_type: Phòng Gia đình nhìn ra Núi
review.comment_positive:
Khách sạn gần ngay quầy bán vé vào Động Phong Nha nên rất thuận tiện ạ.
Phòng sạch sẽ đầy đủ tiện nghi. Nhân viên nhiệt tình, khi mình báo sắp đến thì đã bật trước điều hòa cho khách và gọi điện để hỏi khách đi phương tiện gì để sắp xếp chỗ để xe.
Bố mẹ mình khá hài lòng vì phòng rộng rãi, sạch sẽ.
review.comment_negative: Bữa sáng thì món bánh canh chưa được ngon lắm ạ

review.comment_positive: Nhà nghỉ cạnh bến tàu đi thăm điểm du lịch. Xung quanh nhiều hàng quán ăn. Chủ nhà thân thiện.
review.comment_negative: Nền nhà tắm trát xi măng

review.comment_positive: rộng rãi
review.comment_negative: phòng tối
Nhà vệ sinh phải sạch sẽ hơn

review.comment_positive: Vị trí gần trung tâm
review.comment_negative: Nhân viên, chủ chổ nghỉ phục vụ hời hợt, khách muốn gặp để phản ánh rất khó vì hầu như không thấy có mặt. Trong chi tiết có phục vụ ăn sáng nhưng liên hệ ks thì 6h báo chưa phục vụ phải hơn 7h kêu mới coá, trong khi khách còn phải nhiều lịch tham quan khác. Tóm lại thái độ phục vụ của khách sạn thiếu chuyên nghiệp. Phòng ốc xuống cấp, điều hoà không mát, nước tắm đục và có mùi

review.comment_positive: Great location helpful and friendly staff

Great location, a few minutes walk from mini mart and cave boat station. Room is big and comfortable, as well as bed.  Good breakfast. The manager respond social app very fast so there's no problem communicating before arriving Phong Nha. He booked a bus to Da Nang in advance which is very helpful.
review.comment_negative: Lack of like everything, shampoo, hair dryer, etc, but ask the staff you'll get those. Should've hair dryer in each room, the staff take one from another room. Some other reviews didn't meet these situations so need some luck to have all well prepared. The night-time staff not good at English, ask the manager online for help.

review.rating: Great value and great location for a comfortable stay
review.comment_positive:
We enjoyed our stay at the Midtown hotel. The owner was able to check us in at 4AM at the time that our bus arrived, so that was a great start of our stay. The room itself is very spacious with a big en-suite bathroom including some toiletries. AC works like a charm. At the time of our stay they also had blankets on the bed (not only a sheet). Breakfast options were quite limited, but we enjoyed it every morning. 
The hotel also arranges tours to the different caves and national park.
review.comment_negative: If your room is located on the street side and if you’re a light sleeper, you may experience some discomfort from the noise of the club next door. However, we were able to sleep through it without a problem.

review.comment_positive: Good location close to everything you need. Very spacious and lots of room, clean aswell.
review.comment_negative: Felt like a ghost town and there was no one around.

review.room_type: Phòng Gia đình nhìn ra Núi
review.comment_positive: Good staff, good air on and very clean. He let us check in very early in the morning (4.30 am) so kind. He also helped us book our transport and duck stop. It’s also close to a really good breakfast spot
review.comment_negative: Nothing

Tóm lại thái độ phục vụ của khách sạn thiếu chuyên nghiệp. Phòng ốc xuống cấp, điều hoà không mát, nước tắm đục và có mùi

review.comment_positive: Great location helpful and friendly staff

Great location, a few minutes walk from mini mart and cave boat station. Room is big and comfortable, as well as bed.  Good breakfast. The manager respond social app very fast so there's no problem communicating before arriving Phong Nha. He booked a bus to Da Nang in advance which is very helpful.
review.comment_negative: Lack of like everything, shampoo, hair dryer, etc, but ask the staff you'll get those. Should've hair dryer in each room, the staff take one from another room. Some other reviews didn't meet these situations so need some luck to have all well prepared. The night-time staff not good at English, ask the manager online for help.

review.rating: Great value and great location for a comfortable stay
review.comment_positive:
We enjoyed our stay at the Midtown hotel. The owner was able to check us in at 4AM at the time that our bus arrived, so that was a great start of our stay. The room itself is very spacious with a big en-suite bathroom including some toiletries. AC works like a charm. At the time of our stay they also had blankets on the bed (not only a sheet). Breakfast options were quite limited, but we enjoyed it every morning. 
The hotel also arranges tours to the different caves and national park.
review.comment_negative: If your room is located on the street side and if you’re a light sleeper, you may experience some discomfort from the noise of the club next door. However, we were able to sleep through it without a problem.

review.comment_positive: Good location close to everything you need. Very spacious and lots of room, clean aswell.
review.comment_negative: Felt like a ghost town and there was no one around.

review.room_type: Phòng Gia đình nhìn ra Núi
review.comment_positive: Good staff, good air on and very clean. He let us check in very early in the morning (4.30 am) so kind. He also helped us book our transport and duck stop. It’s also close to a really good breakfast spot
review.comment_negative: Nothing

review.room_type: Phòng Gia đình nhìn ra Núi
review.comment_positive:
Khách sạn gần ngay quầy bán vé vào Động Phong Nha nên rất thuận tiện ạ.
Phòng sạch sẽ đầy đủ tiện nghi. Nhân viên nhiệt tình, khi mình báo sắp đến thì đã bật trước điều hòa cho khách và gọi điện để hỏi khách đi phương tiện gì để sắp xếp chỗ để xe.
Bố mẹ mình khá hài lòng vì phòng rộng rãi, sạch sẽ.
review.comment_negative: Bữa sáng thì món bánh canh chưa được ngon lắm ạ

review.comment_positive: Nhà nghỉ cạnh bến tàu đi thăm điểm du lịch. Xung quanh nhiều hàng quán ăn. Chủ nhà thân thiện.
review.comment_negative: Nền nhà tắm trát xi măng

review.comment_positive: rộng rãi
review.comment_negative: phòng tối
Nhà vệ sinh phải sạch sẽ hơn

review.comment_positive: Vị trí gần trung tâm

Khách sạn gần ngay quầy bán vé vào Động Phong Nha nên rất thuận tiện ạ.
Phòng sạch sẽ đầy đủ tiện nghi. Nhân viên nhiệt tình, khi mình báo sắp đến thì đã bật trước điều hòa cho khách và gọi điện để hỏi khách đi phương tiện gì để sắp xếp chỗ để xe.
Bố mẹ mình khá hài lòng vì phòng rộng rãi, sạch sẽ.
review.comment_negative: Bữa sáng thì món bánh canh chưa được ngon lắm ạ

review.comment_positive: Nhà nghỉ cạnh bến tàu đi thăm điểm du lịch. Xung quanh nhiều hàng quán ăn. Chủ nhà thân thiện.
review.comment_negative: Nền nhà tắm trát xi măng

review.comment_positive: rộng rãi
review.comment_negative: phòng tối
Nhà vệ sinh phải sạch sẽ hơn

review.comment_positive: Vị trí gần trung tâm
review.comment_negative: Nhân viên, chủ chổ nghỉ phục vụ hời hợt, khách muốn gặp để phản ánh rất khó vì hầu như không thấy có mặt. Trong chi tiết có phục vụ ăn sáng nhưng liên hệ ks thì 6h báo chưa phục vụ phải hơn 7h kêu mới coá, trong khi khách còn phải nhiều lịch tham quan khác. Tóm lại thái độ phục vụ của khách sạn thiếu chuyên nghiệp. Phòng ốc xuống cấp, điều hoà không mát, nước tắm đục và có mùi

review.comment_positive: Great location helpful and friendly staff

Great location, a few minutes walk from mini mart and cave boat station. Room is big and comfortable, as well as bed.  Good breakfast. The manager respond social app very fast so there's no problem communicating before arriving Phong Nha. He booked a bus to Da Nang in advance which is very helpful.
review.comment_negative: Lack of like everything, shampoo, hair dryer, etc, but ask the staff you'll get those. Should've hair dryer in each room, the staff take one from another room. Some other reviews didn't meet these situations so need some luck to have all well prepared. The night-time staff not good at English, ask the manager online for help.

review.rating: Great value and great location for a comfortable stay
review.comment_positive:
We enjoyed our stay at the Midtown hotel. The owner was able to check us in at 4AM at the time that our bus arrived, so that was a great start of our stay. The room itself is very spacious with a big en-suite bathroom including some toiletries. AC works like a charm. At the time of our stay they also had blankets on the bed (not only a sheet). Breakfast options were quite limited, but we enjoyed it every morning. 
The hotel also arranges tours to the different caves and national park.
review.comment_negative: If your room is located on the street side and if you’re a light sleeper, you may experience some discomfort from the noise of the club next door. However, we were able to sleep through it without a problem.

review.comment_positive: Good location close to everything you need. Very spacious and lots of room, clean aswell.
review.comment_negative: Felt like a ghost town and there was no one around.

review.room_type: Phòng Gia đình nhìn ra Núi
review.comment_positive: Good staff, good air on and very clean. He let us check in very early in the morning (4.30 am) so kind. He also helped us book our transport and duck stop. It’s also close to a really good breakfast spot
review.comment_negative: Nothing
